EmailTemplate.description: This email template is created for the account executives to reach out to customers 1:1 in SF.
EmailTemplate.name: AE 1:1 Introduction Email
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Aloha Account Representative Introduction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
My name is {{{Sender.Name}}}, and I’m your new NCR Aloha Account Executive. I’m reaching out to see how you’re doing and to let you know if there’s anything I can do to help your restaurant succeed —whether it’s creating contactless dine-in experiences, growing your off-premise ordering, or optimizing the full functionality of the solutions you’re using, I’m happy to speak with you anytime to discuss your specific needs.
NCR is committed to upholding the highest service standards to ensure you have a positive experience throughout our relationship. Our NCR Support team is available at 866-523-3667 to assist you 24 x 7 x 365 days with any technical issues that may arise. Additionally, our dedicated team of Customer Success Managers are the liaisons to our internal teams to assist you with resolving any concerns quickly and efficiently and can be reached at {{{Sender.Email}}}.
Please keep the attached document handy, which includes our Support model, prioritization levels, estimated response time, and escalation process. We look forward to working with you for many years to come.
Thank you again for your partnership.
{{{Sender.Name}}} {{{Sender.Title}}}, NCR Hospitality NCR Corporation {{{Sender.Email}}} | ncr.com
